amendatorysection.catchline: Foreclosure proceedings; proceeds of sale; disposition.
amendatorysection.para: From the proceeds of the sale of any real property, the costs charged thereto shall first be paid. When the plaintiff is a private person, firm, or corporation, the balance thereof, or so much thereof as is necessary, shall be paid to the plaintiff. When the plaintiff is a governmental subdivision, municipal corporation, or drainage or irrigation district, the balance thereof, or so much thereof as is necessary, shall be paid to the county treasurer for distribution to the various governmental subdivisions, municipal corporations, or drainage or irrigation districts entitled thereto in discharge of all claims.

annotation.para: Attorney's fee taxed as costs is not distributable as tax revenue. Strawn v. County of Sarpy, 156 Neb. 797, 58 N.W.2d 168 (1953).
